item.title: 显示HN：WhatsApp MCP服务器
item.description:
hi hn - 我为WhatsApp构建了一个开源的，自主的模型上下文协议（MCP）服务器： https:/ https://github.com/github.com/lharries/lharries/whatsapp-mcp-mcp-mcp-mcp 多设备API（使用蜂鸣器团队的WhatsMeow），并且不依赖第三方API。所有消息均在本地存储在SQLite中。 Nothing is sent to the cloud unless you explicitly allow your LLM to access the data via tools – so you maintain full control and privacy.The MCP server can:- Search your messages, contacts, and groups- Send WhatsApp messages to individuals or groupsWhy build this?99% of your life is stored in WhatsApp, by connecting an LLM to WhatsApp you get all this context.您的AI代理可以通过发送消息来代表您执行任务。
注释URL： https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=43532967 点：103 ＃评论：48
